message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.RO

This paper is about domain adaptation for semantic segmentation neural networks, which is a topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The approach proposed in the paper involves constructing a curriculum of properties about the target domain, which is a machine learning technique (cs.LG). The approach also involves using the segmentation network itself to infer the pyramid of properties, which could be considered a form of self-supervised learning or reinforcement learning (cs.AI). The paper also mentions using gradient descent to optimize the network, which is a common optimization technique in neural networks (cs.NE). Finally, the paper mentions the application of the approach to robotics, which could fall under the category of robotics and control (cs.RO).
